title: Constructivist-Based Program for Enhancing Arabic Reading Comprehension Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arabic Script and Word Recognition Skills
context.additional_context: A program emphasizing foundational Arabic reading comprehension skills for learners in mathematics-related professions. Establishes an activity-based learning environment grounded in the 4C/ID model

learning_goals: Learners can extract and summarize key information from Arabic texts at the paragraph level.
Learners can visually represent the semantic structure of texts using visual aids.
Learners can demonstrate reasoning skills in the process of generating and answering questions based on Arabic texts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
